items.sentence: I haven\'t spoken with Tom since his accident.
Tom parked in the back of his office building.
Tom would\'ve eaten more if he\'d had time to.
Tom would\'ve succeeded if he\'d tried harder.
Tom said he thought he\'d forgotten something.
Tom doesn\'t think you\'ll be able to do that.
Were you the one who planned this whole thing?
I\'m almost certain that Tom can speak French.
Tom is hoping he\'ll be given a second chance.
I\'m surprised Tom didn\'t want to go with us.
